title: Hydrangea

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may dance during the day to summon a rainstorm for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Mafia, Coven, and Neutrals will be notified that a storm is starting at the beginning of the night.
- Players that visit will be drenched in water.
- You will be told all of the players who are not drenched the following day.
- You may not summon a rainstorm Day 1.
- You may only summon 2 rainstorms.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided perform a rain dance."
"The following players are dry: (all player names)."

(Mafia/Coven/Neutrals) "It seems that it's going to rain."

desc:
Post 150
*You are a religious dancer that lurks near the riverbeds.*
